name: HEKA
description:
Hidden secrets wait to be uncovered. . .

The year is 1923, barely more than a century ago the French scholar Jean-Francois Champollion translated ancient Egyptian hieroglyphs on the Rosetta Stone,
marking the beginning of modern Egyptology. Since then several expeditions to Egypt by France, Germany and Britain have taken place, uncovering monolithic structures of stone and ancient tombs packed with gold and esoteric history. One year after Howard Carter’s discovery of King Tutankhamun’s tomb in the Valley of Kings; a young and eager Egyptologist sets out for the sands of The Giza Necropolis. The shifting of desert sand has led to the appearance of a previously unexplored structure. What will he find venturing into this tomb? Perhaps he will ignore his investors warnings of ancient magic and deadly curses in search for untold riches? Or maybe he will embark on a respectful mission to better understand the esoteric dead that rest there? Why don't you decide?

HEKA is a Mystery and Exploration based game set in the early 1920s. In HEKA, you take the role of eager Egyptologist Randolph Crosby setting out for the Giza Necropolis to be the first to explore an ancient tomb uncovered by shifting sands.

The seal has broken. . .

Traverse the crumbling passages of one of the first civilizations to enter the stone age. Avoid deadly traps, decipher ancient hieroglyphs, search for legendary riches, and uncover arcane secrets kept hidden since the dawn of humanity.

Features

  • Delve into the final resting place of kings from a bygone era!
  • Disturb the tomb or let the dead rest peacefully as you traverse the dark halls!
  • Spend your limited ammunition wisely, who knows what else lurks in the dark?
  • Multiple endings and tombs to explore present refreshing gameplay each playthrough!
  • Learn of strange, primeval rituals and magic as you uncover the story!
